name: Game_0
description:
Game_0 Pew pew destroy the aliens

If you have played games like Space Invaders, Space Impact or Galaga, you will totally like this game, this game is currently on development, you may encounter some bugs, so please let me know trough the feedback button that it's in game. The scope of this game is to take the idea of Galaga and telport it to 2020 modern gaming with retro style. Have fun!!

To keep improving the game I need your feedback so please if you had played the game answer this survey.*coff coff * Follow me on my social media

click any icon

P.s. I used Unity's Particle System
